Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to be completed after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time spent in Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in successful payment variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average duration of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION when followed by Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER versus when directly followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Time elapsed between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Request Payment in variants that include Payment Handled
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total cycle time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in variants involving rejections (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION) compared to clean approval paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION occurs

Name: Minimum time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR in rejection-loop variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION is executed after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in domestic reimbursement claims
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Duration of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in variants where the budget owner and supervisor are the same person versus when they are different
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the next activity, distinguishing between approval, rejection, or final approval paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases that eventually lead to Payment Handled without any rejection
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Payment Handled in high-frequency variants (frequency > 1000) versus low-frequency variants (frequency < 50)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to be followed by a rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR or Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that skip the budget owner step
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION when it appears multiple times in the same case due to resubmissions
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total time from first Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to final Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in multi-submission variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in university-wide 2018 data versus 2017 departmental data
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'", 'end': "activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
